summary: Better layout and skill level dependencies for vanilla alchemy perks.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=3]Nexus Exclusive[/size]

[font=\"Georgia\"][size=7][color=\"#3CB371\"]Vini\'s Polished Alchemy Perk Tree[/color][/size][/font]

[font=\"Georgia\"][size=5]Better layout and skill level dependencies for vanilla alchemy perks.[/size][/font]
[/center]


[center]
[font=\"Georgia\"][size=6][color=\"#3CB371\"]Details[/color][/size][/font]
[/center]
This modifies the layout of the alchemy perk tree and changes some skill level dependencies. No new perks are added. Take a look at the images to see the changes. You can also compare it to [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Alchemy]the original tree[/url].

In particular, you get access to the Experimenter perks much earlier than you can with vanilla. Getting Experimenter 1 at alchemy level 50 is ridiculous. By then you should already know the vast majority of alchemical effects. It\'s also a perk that gets worse the farther you progress in alchemy, so giving access to it early just makes sense.

If you like this mod or have any suggestions, pop in and leave a comment. Feel free to check out my other mods as well.


[center]
[font=\"Georgia\"][size=6][color=\"#3CB371\"]Installation[/color][/size][/font]
[/center]

The easiest and best way to install is with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]. After you add the mod to Manager, select it in the list and click the Activate button. 

See the readme for manual installation instructions. 


[center]
[font=\"Georgia\"][size=6][color=\"#3CB371\"]Compatibility[/color][/size][/font]
[/center]
This mod only changes the layout of the alchemy perk tree and most of the alchemy perks, so it is compatible with anything that doesn\'t. 

This mod is available in English and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30772]Spanish[/url]. Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5360720]incata[/url] for the Spanish translation.


[center]
[font=\"Georgia\"][size=6][color=\"#3CB371\"]Changelog[/color][/size][/font]
[/center]
[list]
[*]1.0 - Initial release
[/list]
author: Vinifera7
